mapper.select: select id, name, user_id as "userId", shared, description, data, created_at as "createdAt", updated_at as "updatedAt" from measure_filters WHERE user_id is null and name=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO measure_filters (name, user_id, shared, description, data, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{userId}, #{shared}, #{description}, #{data}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
